SolutionManifest.Description: Solution containing web resources, workflows and client scripts for DIO training and validations.

Component.Name: acdym_Scriptconsultacep9DC6ABFF-7.js
Component.Description: JavaScript to call ActionCEP and populate address fields from CEP.

Component.Name: acdym_SscriptValidacoes50B6C092-A.js
Component.Description: Client-side validation for CPF and CNPJ formatting and verification.

Component.Name: ActionCEP
Component.Description: Custom action to return CEP lookup result (ResultadoCEP).

Component.Description: Validates required fields for student records (email or phone required).

Component.Name: FieldsBehaviorByPersonType
Component.DisplayName: Fields Behavior According To Person Type
Component.Description: Shows/hides CPF/CNPJ and sets required levels based on person type (individual/company).
